content.text:
# 35th Academy of Country Music Awards

(5 each)
| most_wins =  (2 each)
| network = CBS
| host = Dolly Parton
| ratings =
| previous = 34th
| main = ACM
| next = 36th
}}
The 35th Academy of Country Music Awards was held on May 3, 2000, at the Universal Amphitheatre, in Los Angeles, California. The ceremony was hosted by Dolly Parton.
Winners and nominees
Winners are shown in bold.
{| class="wikitable"
! width="50%" style="background:#EEDD85;" |Entertainer of the Year
! width="50%" style="background:#EEDD85;" |Album of the Year

| style="vertical-align:top" |
* Shania Twain
** The Dixie Chicks
** Faith Hill
** Tim McGraw
** Sawyer Brown
| style="vertical-align:top" |

** A Place in the Sun — Tim McGraw
** Breathe — Faith Hill
** Cold Hard Truth — George Jones
** Ride with Bob — Asleep at the Wheel
